summary: This is an email chain from October 16, 2019, forwarding a summary of testimony by Federal Defender Patton regarding conditions at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) and Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). The testimony references the fire at MDC and Jeffrey Epstein's suicide at MCC, using it to discuss poor conditions generally.

persons.name: Berman, Geoffrey

persons.name: Epstein, Jeffrey
persons.context: Referenced in the testimony due to his suicide at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

events.title: Fire at MDC
events.description: A fire occurred at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) at the beginning of the year.

events.title: Epstein's Suicide at MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

keyFacts: Federal Defender Patton gave testimony regarding poor conditions at MCC and MDC.
The testimony referenced a fire at MDC that occurred at the beginning of 2019.
The testimony referenced Jeffrey Epstein's suicide at MCC in August 2019 as an example to discuss poor conditions, though Patton acknowledged having no specific information about it.
